name: Pico8 - Zelda
description:
Third and last school project in Pico8. Time : 1 Week

A simple zelda like adventure game in Pico 8 with the mouse implemented !

Use it to open quest menu and inventory.

Find keys around the map to unlock new areas.

Collect weapons and find your way through the obstacles to defeat the Boss !

Don't forget to read the dialogues (in french sry).
